original_text: But God led the people about, through the way of the wilderness of the Red sea: and the children of Israel went up harnessed out of the land of Egypt.
korean_text: 그러므로 하나님이 홍해의 광야 길로 돌려 백성을 인도하시매 이스라엘 자손이 애굽 땅에서 대열을 지어 나올 때에

sentences.original_text: But God led the people about
through the way of the wilderness of the Red sea
and the children of Israel went up harnessed
out of the land of Egypt
